name: Windy Lights
description:
Feel the wind... and shoot, jump, dodge, protect, speed up, make it rain, drop some bombs, throw a couple of lightning bolts and more while racing from checkpoint to checkpoint.

--------IMPORTANT---------

Please try free demo before you buy to make sure everything is working good for you.

I made and tested this game on a PC with the following specifications:

CPU - Intel Core i5 2320 @ 3.00GHz

Ram - 8.00 GB

VGA - Geforce GTX 750 Ti

Anything lower than these and game may have performance issues

or may not. I don't really know.

Also it is strongly recommended to install DirectX

to achieve better performance.

You can find it in a designated installation folder.

It is called dxwebsetup.exe

--------------------------------

Controls:

keyboard in the game

mouse in the menus

--------------------------------

I hope you have fun. Cheers!
